description: Shaw is a playful, streetwear-coded cyberpunk kid/teen character with a mischievous “DJ/tech-hacker” vibe, often posing in expressive, performance-like gestures (shushing, hands up, stepping/dancing).

features.distinguishing: Orange 'San Andreas' cap; oversized futuristic cybernetic headset/face device on the left side with a circular tech module/display; large tinted/teal sunglasses or visor goggles; chibi proportions and bold, animated poses; black background presentation.
features.costume: Orange cap with white lettering, large sci-fi headset/earpiece, tinted sunglasses/visor; pink/purple tie-dye or patterned long-sleeve top; black shorts; white striped knee socks; dark shoes.
features.style: Stylized 3D cartoon/chibi (toy-like proportions) with cyberpunk accessories.

images.description: Stylized 3D character sitting on a gray chair against a black background, wearing an orange "San Andreas" cap, one large cybernetic face device on the left side, light blue sunglasses, a pink tie-dye shirt, black shorts, striped white socks, and dark shoes.
Stylized 3D character bust wearing an orange cap, large tinted goggles, and a bulky circular-tech headset, with both hands held up near the mouth against a solid black background.

Full-body 3D cartoon character standing in a slight 3/4 right angle on a solid black background, wearing an orange "San Andreas" cap, large techno headset/earpiece, teal sunglasses, a pink tie-dye shirt, dark shorts, striped white socks, and dark shoes.
Stylized character in a side-left view wearing an orange cap, large sci-fi headset, and dark sunglasses, holding one finger to their lips against a solid black background.

Stylized 3D character bust facing forward on a black background, wearing an orange 'San Andreas' cap, sunglasses, a large cybernetic face/ear device with a lit display, and a pink-purple top, with both hands raised near the head.

Stylized 3D character shown from the chest up at a 3/4 right angle, wearing an orange cap with "San Andreas" text, dark visor goggles, a large sci-fi headset on the left side, and a pink patterned top, with both hands raised in a gesture against a solid black background.

A stylized 3D character shown from head to upper legs at a 3/4 right angle, wearing an orange cap with white lettering, dark sunglasses, a futuristic headset, and a purple tie-dye shirt while holding one hand raised in a small gesture on a black background.

Full-body 3D chibi-style character in a stepping pose, wearing an orange cap with white text, a large futuristic headset and dark visor, a pink tie-dye shirt, dark shorts, striped socks, and dark shoes on a solid black background.

Stylized 3D chibi character shown from the upper body at a 3/4 right angle, wearing an orange cap with white text, large futuristic headphones, teal sunglasses, a pink patterned long-sleeve shirt, and holding both arms out to the sides on a black background.

Full-body stylized character in a wide crouched stance with arms raised outward, wearing an orange cap with white text, a cyber headset over one eye, sunglasses, a pink tie-dye shirt, dark shorts, striped knee socks, and dark shoes on a solid black background.
A stylized 3D chibi character in an orange cap and pink shirt with a cybernetic headpiece and sunglasses is mid-leap with arms raised beside a gray armchair on a solid black background.

Stylized 3D character bust facing forward on a black background, wearing an orange cap with text, a large sci‑fi headset on the left side, a tinted visor over one eye, and holding both hands up near the chin in a playful pose.

Stylized 3D character bust in a pink tie-dye shirt with arms held out, wearing an orange "SanAndreas" cap, dark goggles, and a mechanical device covering the left side of the face on a solid black background.

A stylized chibi 3D character shown from the torso up in a 3/4 right view, wearing an orange "San Andreas" cap, large cyber-style headset over one side of the head, dark sunglasses, and a pink shirt, with one hand held to the chin against a solid black background.

Stylized 3D bust of a character in a black background wearing an orange cap with lettering, a large cybernetic headset covering the left side of the face, a tinted visor over the right eye, and a purple-pink shirt, smiling with eyes closed.
